H1: About Me
I am currently an Assistant Professor (Research) at the Department of Computing at . I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from in 2023, advised by . Prior to that, I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology from the ACM Honor Class at in 2018, advised by .



Email and address: haoyang-comp.li@polyu.edu.hk, PQ810 PolyU.



If you’d like to come to the office to chat with me, please send me an email or WeChat message in advance to find a mutually available time slot.



Position Opening

name: Haoyang
content:
If you’d like to come to the office to chat with me, please send me an email or WeChat message in advance to find a mutually available time slot.



Position Opening



• Self-motivated full-time Research Assistants (RAs) with strong coding skills are seeked. Part-time RA positions are NOT available.
• The PhD positions starting from 2025/09 or later are now open. The admitted PhD candidate will be supervised by myself and our department head Prof. Qing Li.
• Self-motivated undergraduate and master's students with strong coding skills (from PolyU, mainland universities, etc.), who are interested in our research topics, are also welcome. These students will be given priority consideration for PhD opportunities.
• MSc students at PolyU who seek a dissertation supervisor. Only 1-2 quotas are available now (2024/9/25).

name: Haoyang
content:
H2: Research Interests
• Data Management for Machine Learning
• Data-driven Machine Learning
• Data and Model Security
• Large Language Models
• Graph Neural Networks and Knowledge Bases
